metadata.synopsis: Roah finds that most of her men are dead, and decides against attacking the Guild.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ATeleport to:S_LOW_Guildhall_Entrancea78a0b7b-489a-4743-9e6e-4c88f24cc2caKill most of the Zhent and then ReCon:oe Debug_Guildhall_ZhentBetrayal

0.speaker: Roah Moonglow
0.text: Well. Can't quite seal the deal with all my soldiers dead...
0.context: NodeContext: Returning to GH to find most of her fighters dead - to herself, reflecting that she can't pull the coup she was planning
